alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 9:05PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and west central Pennington Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 905 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Roubaix Lake to 4 miles northeast of Hisega. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Rapid City, Sturgis, Black Hawk, Summerset, Johnson Siding, Nemo, Piedmont, Silver City, Hisega, Tilford, Pactola Reservoir, Dalton Lake, Bear Butte State Park, Roubaix Lake and Fort Meade. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 28 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
